channel.title: [PI] 317 hiscore problem: Not connecting to my no-ip ip [PI]
channel.description:
[b]Welcome, I'm having a slight problem with the IP,[/b]
1) I have add port 80-80 to my router website thing so that's portfoward and i named it hiscores. 2) I went to my firewall and added hiscores to TCP and UDP port 80 and named it hiscores aswell. 3) I went to my c: drive and went into my xampp folder and then htdocs then hiscores and i have changed all the ip's in all the files to legacypro.no-ip.biz (my ip) and left the myconnection bit in mysql.php to 'Localhost' Then i try going to my hiscores (http://legacypro.no-ip.biz/highscores/highscores.php) on the internet and it doesnt load. The only time it loads when i use: http://127.0.0.1/highscores/highscores.php
Please comment if you have spot a problem, please help guys!
You may contact me on my msn: King-of-msn@hotmail.co.uk If you have team-viewer please contact me if you can fix this or else please comment below, thanks.
- Skylar

item.title: [PI] 317 hiscore problem: Not connecting to my no-ip ip [PI]
item.dc:creator: @moparRuler moparRuler
item.description:
@moparRuler wrote:

I had exact same problem. My problem was that my isp didn’t allow port 80 to be used. So all I did was go to Xampp folder, than Apache, than i went to conf, opened up httpd.conf with notepad ++ doesn’t matter what you use.

searched for 80, changed them to 60. restarted apache, forwarded to port 60. bham worked fine.

I added you on msn, so if you need help feel free to give a shout their. I can also do TM.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] 317 hiscore problem: Not connecting to my no-ip ip [PI]

item.title: [PI] 317 hiscore problem: Not connecting to my no-ip ip [PI]
item.dc:creator: @king-of-pvp king-of-pvp
item.description:
@king-of-pvp wrote:

Welcome, I’m having a slight problem with the IP,

  1. I have add port 80-80 to my router website thing so that’s portfoward and i named it hiscores.
  2. I went to my firewall and added hiscores to TCP and UDP port 80 and named it hiscores aswell.
  3. I went to my c: drive and went into my xampp folder and then htdocs then hiscores
    and i have changed all the ip’s in all the files to legacypro.no-ip.biz (my ip) and left the myconnection bit in mysql.php to ‘Localhost’
    Then i try going to my hiscores (http://legacypro.no-ip.biz/highscores/highscores.php) on the internet and it doesnt load. The only time it loads when i use: http://127.0.0.1/highscores/highscores.php

Please comment if you have spot a problem, please help guys!

You may contact me on my msn: King-of-msn@hotmail.co.uk
If you have team-viewer please contact me if you can fix this or else please comment below, thanks.

  • Skylar
